tag_list: website-design, web-development, branding, identity, saas, software-as-a-service, cloud-computing, internet-marketing, web-usability, ecommerce, video, seo, sem, search-engine-marketing, philippines, call-center, consultant, philippine-real-estate, techno
overview:
Tiger Bitanga CEO, The Design People Inc. | design + marketing + web

The Design People Inc. creates business websites. Since co-founding the web design studio in 1999, I’ve helped the company expand to offices in Los Angeles and Manila, over 7,000 customers served and a team of 150 web designers, art directors, project managers and web strategists.

The Design People Inc. has been recognized as one of the Inc. 5000 fastest growing companies in the U.S. and Deloitte Tech Fast 500 for two years running. We’re best known as the people behind Agent Image, our online real estate marketing and technology arm.

I’m a huge believer in the power of social media, tribes and networking. I enjoy meeting all types of new and interesting people. If you’d like to strike up a conversation in any way, please don’t hesitate to connect.

Specialties Website design, web development, branding, identity, SaaS, software-as-a-service, cloud computing, Internet marketing, web usability, ecommerce, video, SEO, SEM, search engine marketing, Philippines, call center, consultant, Philippine real estate, technology, contact center, BPO, business process outsourcing, iPhone, Android, iPad, application development, user experience, mobile apps, Google, social media, social networking, graphic design, entrepreneur

Interests Family, keeping up with technology, design, social media experiments, real estate investing, football, beach volleyball, badminton, computer gaming

Additional Info

-AIU Advisory Board Member, Graphic Design & Visual Communication -Authorized Reseller for Google AdWords -4-Time Inc 5000 fastest Growing Private Companies in America honoree (2007-2010) -3-time Fastest Growing Private Companies in Los Angeles honoree by the Los Angeles Business Journal (2007-2009) -2-Time Deloitte Technology Fast 500 honoree (2008-2009)
